body:
Hello,



Is it possible to generate a custom sky that is independent from time? Why does the custom sky component needs input for date ?



Greetings,

Mustafa

replies.body: to calculate the sun vector. Otherwise how does it know where the sun is located in the sky? If you want to generate a [sky with certain illuminance level component](https://mostapharoudsari.gitbooks.io/honeybee-primer/content/text/components/Generate_Sky_With_Certain_Illuminance_level.html).
Thank you for your reply Mostapha.
